name: Skull Collector I
description: Eliminate 1 enemy with a headshot in Classic Mode to complete the Skull Collector I mission.

rewards.title: Skull Collector I
rewards.extra: Earn achievement points for getting your first headshot elimination.

tipsTricks.heading: Aim for the Head
tipsTricks.description: Concentrate on your aim and target the head. It's the fastest way to eliminate an enemy.

tipsTricks.heading: Use a Scoped Weapon
tipsTricks.description: Using a weapon with a scope (like an M416 with a Red Dot or 4x scope) will make headshots easier.

tipsTricks.heading: Take Advantage of Standstill Moments
tipsTricks.description: When enemies are standing still or focused on something else, aim for the head to make your shot count.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 1 Enemy with Headshots
requirements.description: To complete this mission, you need to eliminate at least one enemy with a headshot.

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: This mission can only be completed in Classic Mode, so ensure you're playing in that mode.
